title: Heartukulla Pachkuthiye Lyrics Gulaebaghavali
stanzas:
enakku ummela thaan
unakku emmela thaan
yedho onne onnu irukku irukku

lightaa budhi vara
loose-aa suththi vara
ok solluriyaa enakku enakku

heartukulla pachchakuthiye
pogaatha en pachcha kizhiye
pesaama nee paththa vachiye
kaattu konjam
pachcha pachcha pachcha
kodiye. (2)

en pachchakizhiye
en pachcha pachcha
pachcha kodiye

will you be my
honey bunny
people think I am
really funny.
tharuven enna ini
vaamaa honey bunny. (2)

en firstu lookuliye
usura vitten
bestu frienda ellaam
kalati vitten

ayyo paavamnu
ok panren
illa illa illa
think panni solren.

adadaa kannammaa
enna ponnammaa
hotu watera thaan
heartukulla ooththitiye

aavaa chellammaa
feelings ennammaa
lovea solradhukku
logic ellaam paakkuriyemaa

enakku ummela thaan
unakku emmela thaan
yedho onne onnu irukku irukku

lightaa budhi vara
loose-aa suththi vara
ok solluvene unakku unakku

heartukulla pachchakuthiye
pogaatha en pachcha kizhiye
pesaama nee paththa vachiye
kaattu konjam
pachcha pachcha pachcha
kodiye. (2)

en pachcha pachcha
pachcha kodiye

will you be my
honey bunny
people think I am
really funny.
tharuven enna ini
vaamaa honey bunny.  (2)
